channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AL

item.title: Report X-2023100091
item.description:
Report X-2023100091

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-07T18:15:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: OPELIKA
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE LOADER WAS LOADING THE PACKAGE ONTO THE PACKAGE CAR, AND THEN NOTICED THAT THE CONTENTS HAD LEAKED AND DISCOLORED THE CARDBOARD. HE THEN NOTIFIED THE SUPERVISOR, WHO NOTIFIED THE DESIGNATED RESPONDER. RESPONDER DONNED PPE, RETRIEVED THE PACKAGE FROM THE PACKAGE CAR, AND PLACED IT ON THE DMP TABLE FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023100031
item.description:
Report X-2023100031

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-06T09:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-23
  • City: MONTGOMERY
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO PACKAGE WEARING PROPER PPE AND DECISION TREE IN HAND. RESPONDERD DISCOVERED PACKAGE LEAKING ON FLOOR OF TRAILER. USED APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET, CONTAINED LEAKER, AND TRANSFERED TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023081376
item.description:
Report X-2023081376

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-03T00:35:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-28
  • City: Irondale
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: NORFOLK SOUTHERN RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Norfolk Southern personnel reported a leak coming from the protective housing on tank car MULX702015. Upon inspection by a contractor, both liquid line valves were found partially open and the closure plugs were less than tool tight. The valves were closed and the plugs were properly secured.
